competitors.name: Adidas
competitors.market_position: Major global sportswear brand; Nike's biggest competitor with significant presence in India and targeting Gen Z.

competitors.name: Anta
competitors.market_position: Leading Chinese sportswear company; growing rapidly and expanding globally, benefiting from local nationalism trends.

competitors.name: Li-Ning
competitors.market_position: Prominent Chinese sportswear brand riding the “Guochao” fashion trend with strong growth and expanding global footprint.

competitors.name: Fila
competitors.market_position: Well-known international sportswear brand competing in footwear and apparel segments relevant to Gen Z fashion.

competitors.name: Under Armour
competitors.market_position: US-based athletic apparel and footwear brand competing with Nike in the sportswear market.

competitors.name: New Balance
competitors.market_position: Global athletic brand with a solid reputation in running shoes and casual footwear targeting younger consumers.

competitors.name: Skechers
competitors.market_position: International footwear brand with a growing youth-focused collection positioned as a lifestyle and sports casual brand.

competitors.name: Lululemon
competitors.market_position: Premium athletic apparel brand specializing in athleisure and yoga wear, competing with Nike in apparel for younger consumers.

competitors.name: Athleta
competitors.market_position: Athletic apparel brand under Gap Inc., positioned in the lifestyle and wellness segment, competing in women's activewear.

competitors.name: VF Corporation
competitors.market_position: Parent company of various apparel brands competing in athletic and casual wear, offering indirect competition to Nike.
